title: Smart Data Models - SvVoltage
description: Adapted from CIM data models. State variable for voltage.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SvVoltage

TopologicalNode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The state voltage associated with the topological node. Default: None

angle.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The voltage angle of the topological node complex voltage with respect to system reference. Default: 0.0

v.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The voltage magnitude of the topological node. Default: 0.0
